content: the emeline pumpkin is a textured stitch using forked clusters and half double crochets you can find the free pattern on my blog https //rinknitsandstuff com/2025/09/05/emeline-pumpkin-free-crochet-pattern/ you can watch the video tutorial on youtube - there is a left hand and right hand version **for lefty s ** https //youtu be/oyp-hw4ek1s si=j8fmdk1jivbpzn-q **for righty s ** https //youtu be/i9c4nlmkmss si=mrkrpoxpktnf73mk
